homeCategory.title: Explore Our Course Categories
homeCategory.subtitle: Choose from 8+ categories and start your learning journey today

popularCourse.description: At Bdcalling Academy, we provide skill-based training programs customized to meet the evolving needs of today's job market. Whether you're just beginning your career or looking to upgrade your professional expertise, our flexible learning options are designed to help you stay competitive.
popularCourse.joinThousands: Join thousands of successful learners today

seminarEvent.description: Whether you're a student or a working professional, our interactive seminars and industry events are crafted to educate, motivate, and equip you for a successful career in the tech industry. Gain valuable insights from experienced professionals.
seminarEvent.seminarDesc: Unlock your potential with guidance from industry leaders.
seminarEvent.eventsDesc: Build your network through meaningful connections.

whatWeProvide.subtitle: We're committed to elevating your learning journey with special features and support that empower you to grow without limitations.

features.jobPlacementDesc: At Bdcalling Academy, we offer more than just technical skills. Our Soft Skills & CV Class is designed to help you pursue your dream career. Our dedicated placement support team provides personalized advice, interview preparation, and valuable industry connections.
features.lifetimeSupportDesc: Our support doesn't end when the course finishesâ€”our dedicated team is available 24/7, even long after you've completed your training. Through personalized guidance and continuous support, we help you overcome career challenges and grow every day.
features.getCertificationDesc: Upon successfully completing your course, you'll earn an industry-recognized certificate that validates your skills and strengthens your professional credibility. This certification will help you stand out in the job market.

concerns.subtitle: We collaborate with leading organizations, universities, and institutions to provide the best learning experience.

successHistory.subtitle: At Bdcalling Academy, our students grow with confidence, help others, and build real careers. Their success inspires us to keep creating opportunities.

eventsPage.subtitle: Connect with industry experts and gain practical insights into the latest tech trends.

coursesPage.subtitle: Unlock practical, in-demand courses designed to align with your career goals.

courseDetails.checkBack: Check back soon for instructor details.

aboutPage.subtitle: Hub of skill development. We are committed to building a skilled and digitally empowered Bangladesh.
aboutPage.description1: Our courses cover a wide range of in-demand IT fields, including web development, software development, networking, cybersecurity, database management, multimedia, programming, marketing, and design.
aboutPage.description2: At Bdcalling Academy, we believe in practical learning, industry-relevant training, and a supportive community. Our mission is to bridge the skills gap, foster innovation, and create opportunities for the next generation of digital pioneers.
aboutPage.ceoMessage: Empowering individuals with the right skills is the key to unlocking global opportunities. At BD Calling Academy, we don't just teach; we prepare you for the future.
aboutPage.globalLeadershipDesc: To be the world's leading IT training platform, developing a skilled workforce with a diverse range of technical expertise to shape the future of the global tech industry.
aboutPage.employmentGoalsDesc: Our goal is to create over 5,000 job opportunities by 2030, actively contributing to building the Digital Bangladesh and helping to lower the nation's unemployment rate.
aboutPage.practicalSkillsDesc: We're committed to equipping individuals with practical technical skills, developing the core foundation for career success in a rapidly changing tech world.
aboutPage.careerPathsDesc: We provide industry-focused training that opens up a variety of IT career paths, empowering more people to excel in the IT sector and make a meaningful impact.
aboutPage.pioneersDesc: We focus on practical, industry-relevant training that prepares individuals for successful careers in the tech world.
aboutPage.growthDesc: We believe in continuous learning and personal development, encouraging students to expand their potential and adapt to the evolving digital landscape.
aboutPage.impactDesc: We measure our success by the impact our training has on learners' careers and their contributions to the tech ecosystem.
aboutPage.communityDesc: We foster a supportive environment where collaboration and shared learning drive collective success.
aboutPage.excellenceSubtitle: Setting the standard for digital skill sets.
aboutPage.excellenceDesc: We are committed to delivering high-quality, cutting-edge training that empowers learners to innovate and lead in the tech industry.

contactPage.subtitle: Have questions about our courses or careers? We're here to help! Reach out and let's start a conversation about your future.
contactPage.subject: Subject
contactPage.socialDescription: Stay connected with us on social media for updates, tips, and more!
contactPage.whatsappDescription: Chat with us directly on WhatsApp for instant support.
contactPage.messageResponse: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

footer.ctaHeading: Ready to Start Your Learning Journey?
footer.ctaDescription: Join thousands of successful students and transform your career today.
footer.brandDescription: Bdcalling Academy is a leading IT training institute in Bangladesh, offering career-oriented courses to help you enhance your skills and build a successful career in the tech industry.

mentorsPage.subtitle: Behind the leading IT skill development platform, masterminds of industry leaders are working. From the management to the expert mentors, highly skilled people are dedicated to your skill advancement.

certificationPage.enterDetails: Enter your phone number, email, or student ID to find your certificate.
